message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you 60/40, is that fair?
I'll accept 60/40, but I want a bit more. How about 42/58?
You're moving the needle, but I'll take a bigger slice. 70/30, my final offer
I'll give you a bigger slice, but not that big. How about 38/62?
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. 75/25, take it or leave it!
I'm not desperate, I'm just trying to be realistic. How about 32/68?
You're getting closer to reality, but I'm not there yet. 80/20, last chance!
I'm not giving up yet. How about 28/72?
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. 85/15, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet. How about 24/76?
It's down to the wire. I'll give you a tiny crumb. 90/10, my final offer
